tag_list: social-media, photos, video, curation, organization, crowdsourcing, timeline, aggregation
overview:
Kieve is an accomplished digital media executive recognized for leadership ability and strategic vision with a proven track record of successes building digital media businesses.

He is a digital media pioneer at the forefront of recognizing growth opportunities, creating innovative policies and forming new and unique operational business units. He’s had multiple successes in senior leadership positions with responsibilities for increasing revenues, creating business strategies and optimizing business operations in digital entertainment.

Currently, Kieve is the Co-Founder of Dather. Dather was created because the world needs a better way to organize and share media. Currently social media is scattered across the web: Facebook, YouTube, Flickr, Twitter, etc. It’s unorganized and it gets harder and harder to find anything over time. 30 billion pieces of this content are shared monthly on Facebook alone.

Dather lets you collaboratively organize and curate photos, videos, blog posts, and tweets in one place. And it’s all on a timeline so it’s easy to find and share.

His primary focus is on business development, investor relations, sales, and operations. www.dather.com
